name: Hextiles
description:
Hextiles is a puzzle game based on strategy and planning ahead. Each level consists of certain objectives that must be completed within a given time frame. Each tile has different conversions and can also have unique effects on their neighbours, which can drastically change the game board if one is not careful. 

This game was originally developed for Android, but has also been ported to a browser playable format. 

Hand-Crafted Levels

Each level was created manually, in order to maintain full control over the difficulty, look and feel, and enjoyability of each level.

3 Level Packs

This initial release consists of 3 unique level packs, a Tutorial pack with 6 levels, and Beginner and Intermediate packs each with 20 additional levels.

Feedback Wanted!

If you enjoy this game, please let me know! If you come up with a unique level idea and want to see it in the game, let me know as well and your name can be credited in the game!
